setJavaVersion 1.8 SBT_VER_OVERRIDE=$sbt_version_override # Publish Scala.js artifacts locally # Then go into standalone project and test npm install && sbt ++2.11.12 compiler/publishLocal library/publishLocal \ testInterface/publishLocal stubs/publishLocal \ jUnitPlugin/publishLocal jUnitRuntime/publishLocal && sbt ++$toolsscala ${SBT_VER_OVERRIDE:+^^$SBT_VER_OVERRIDE} \ ir/publishLocal tools/publishLocal jsEnvs/publishLocal \ nodeJSEnv/publishLocal testAdapter/publishLocal \ sbtPlugin/publishLocal && cd sbt-plugin-test && setJavaVersion $java && if [ -n "$SBT_VER_OVERRIDE" ]; then echo "sbt.version=$SBT_VER_OVERRIDE" > ./project/build.properties; fi && sbt noDOM/run \ noDOM/testHtml multiTestJS/testHtml \ test \ noDOM/clean noDOM/concurrentUseOfLinkerTest \ multiTestJS/test:testScalaJSSourceMapAttribute && sbt 'set scalaJSStage in Global := FullOptStage' \ noDOM/testHtml multiTestJS/testHtml
